mapper.select: select count(*) from free where ${param1} like '%${param2}%'
select no, title, content, emp_name, emp_no, file_name, regdate, low_dept_name, refer, depth, step from free where no=#{no}
select emp_name, content, regdate from (select rownum rn, emp_name, content, regdate from re_free where no=#{no} order by re_no asc)

select e.emp_no, e.emp_name, l.low_dept_name, e.low_dept_no from (select e.emp_no, e.low_dept_no, e.emp_name from userDto e join (select emp_no from emp_detail ed where id=#{id}) ed on e.emp_no=ed.emp_no) e join low_dept l on e.low_dept_no=l.low_dept_no
mapper.insert: insert into free(no, emp_no, emp_name, low_dept_no, low_dept_name, refer, depth, step, hit, title, content, regdate, file_name) values(FREE_SEQ.nextval, #{emp_no}, #{emp_name}, #{low_dept_no}, #{low_dept_name}, #{refer}, #{depth}, #{step}, #{hit}, #{title},#{content}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{file_name})
insert into RE_free(re_no, no, emp_no, emp_name, content, regdate) values(RE_FREE_SEQ.nextval, #{no}, #{emp_no}, #{emp_name}, #{content}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.update: update free SET hit=hit+1 where no=#{no}
update free set step=step+1, depth=depth+1 where refer=#{param1} and step>#{param2}
